text: Pen nep takaw olap mɨseŋ agɨnɨgebin agak. Yɨp apal, Pol chɨn Juda ogɨnap gɨpun tek ma gup apal agak. Ne kanɨb anɨb pal ak kɨdek gup apal agak. Bɨawl kanɨb tep ne ameb apal ak kɨdek gup apal agak. Takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd apal agak. Apɨs based sɨkop God agnɨgelɨgɨpal anep, yad agnepin agak. Bɨ Mosis ayɨp bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok ayɨp, kɨli takaw ñu kɨl tɨkɨlak ak ma kelɨgɨpin agak.
